attributes.additional_details:
Reading an article online, 27 letters written by Prince Charles to ministers have been blocked for publication. It is in the public interest, if the Attorney General views the publications as 'could damage prince's ability to perform duties as king'

If one day Prince Charles is King of United Kingdom, how can people of this country respect and have this person as our head of state.

Where is democracy?
These letters need to be released.

Article - http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2012/oct/16/attorney-general-blocks-prince-charles-letters
